AMQPQueue::declare

(PECL amqp >= Unknown)

AMQPQueue::declare — Declare a new queue

Description

public int AMQPQueue::declare ([ string $queue_name = "" [, int $flags = AMQP_AUTODELETE ]] )

Declare a new queue on the broker.

Parameters

queue_name

The name of the queue to declare.

flags

A bitmask of any of the flags: AMQP_AUTODELETE, AMQP_PASSIVE, AMQP_DURABLE, AMQP_NOACK.

Return Values

Returns the message count.
